title: Water: our national asset
creator_credit: B.F.C. Barrington and State Rivers and Water Supply Commission
brief_description: Shows the selection, development, maintenance and operation of irrigation schemes. Emphasises the importance of irrigation in keeping drought in check and increasing primary production.
